concept.title: Set up the Directory
concept.abstract: Once the initial installation process is complete, staff users can create directories by pulling data from either the Account or Contact objects. After the Directory Object is set, it cannot be edited. All of the data elements in the directory are pulled from this object.

conbody.p: Add the Directories tab to a tab bar; this opens the Directory list view. Next, click on the New button to initiate the Directory Builder. In the modal window, select an available object from the Directory Object drop-down list. Once saved, the Directory Object cannot be changed. All of the data elements in the directory come from this object.
Enter the Directory Name in order to Save & Continue. The Directory Name came be changed later.

p.note: With configuration, the system administrator can add the API name of additional objects to this picklist. This will allow the organization to create directories based on data in those objects.
